special_text:
[i]“I am fire! And life incarnate! Now and forever, I am Phoenix!”
–Jean Grey[/i]
Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Rise of the Phoenix deals 2 damage to each opponent.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with an ember counter on it. It gains flying and haste until end of turn. 
Sacrifice each creature you control with an ember counter on it.
